=== I AM MY OWN GOD (ver 2) ===

--- Ultimate Guitar Version ---
Source: Ultimate Guitar (Unregistered)
Artist: Dayglo Abortions
Album: Feed Us A Fetus
Tuning: Standard (E-A-D-G-B-E)

from feed us a fetus

riff 1 (chorus riff is same chords, just follow along with strumming)
